ygData.subject: BBC reporter seeks help...
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi... Sorry to barge into your group uninvited, but I m a BBC reporter looking for an avid EQ fan who lives in the London area, and wouldn t mind giving up an
ygData.messageBody:
Hi... Sorry to barge into your group uninvited, but I'm a BBC
reporter looking for an avid EQ fan who lives in the London area, and
wouldn't mind giving up an hour of their life next Thursday (3rd Oct)
to tell us what it is about the game that makes it so popular. It's
for a 4 minute feature that's going into the techie show on the BBC
world service - Click Online.

If you can help me, please mail me asap on
kate@.... Also, if you know anywhere else I could
post to get the message out I'd be very happy to hear from you.
Thanks for your time.
Kate
